Holy shit . [I]0-i panted in the backseat of [the cab]218-the cab , still running on the adrenaline of tonight ’s potentially disastrous decision - making . It could be the biggest mistake of [my]0-i life but fuck it , [I]0-i ’d done it . [I]0-i ’d finally walked out . [I]0-i was supposed to be Stable [Sara]100-sara with Excel sheets for everything from [her]100-sara taxes to [her]100-sara groceries to [her]100-sara budget for next year ’s Christmas gifts , but tonight [I]0-i had officially reached [my]0-i limit and quit the dream job [I]0-i ’d given [my]0-i entire adult life to despite [everyone]219-everyone imploring [me]0-i to stay . But [the company]220-the company ’s so famous , so iconic . [You]221-you ’ve put in so much time already . Why not stick around ? Should n’t [you]221-you consider [yourself]221-you lucky to be [there]222-there in the first place ? ” [I]223-i scrunched up [my]223-i face as [I]223-i freed [myself]223-i from [my]223-i blazer . Yeah , no . Not so much . Well . [I]223-i bit [my]223-i lip . [I]223-i had answers for that . 13

[SARA]100-sara

[JULIAN]110-julian

[I]0-i took off of work for the first week that [Sara]100-sara came [home]351-home . [We]1712-we exchanged the same knowing grin when [I]0-i offered [her]100-sara [my]0-i place to stay since [she]100-sara ’d given up [her]100-sara lease . [She]100-sara was moving in with [me]0-i . [We]1712-we were both well aware of that – [we]1712-we just did n’t say it quite yet . But within the first three days , [we]1712-we fell into a perfect little domestic routine . [I]0-i woke up early to go for a run , come [home]351-home to shower then make [us]1712-we breakfast . [We]1712-we generally let breakfast go cold while having sex anywhere from the bed to [the bathroom]322-the bathroom , but it did n’t matter because anything tasted good after the appetite [we]1712-we worked up . It was a routine [every other couple]1717-every other couple had , and it was apparently everything [I]0-i needed to be perfectly happy and content . [My]0-i favorite nights were the one when [Mom]137-mom or [Emmett]113-emmett dropped by , either to drop off some home cooked food or , in [Emmett]113-emmett ’s case , to eat it . Epilogue

[SARA]100-sara

The End

Sweet Spot

Chapter One

[LIA]101-lia

On any other night , [I]0-i loved living alone . Fucking loved it . Pants were optional and bras were such an afterthought they might as well not exist . On some days , they were shed at the door and flung onto the couch where [they]1741-their ’d hang out for a couple hours while [I]0-i showered with the door open and walked around naked for no reason . Ninety percent of the time , in [[my]0-i little 18th Street apartment]1742-my little 18th street apartment , [I]0-i was in some state of undress – in a T - shirt and panties or just panties . Sometimes a robe left untied . Sweats and a bra , perhaps ? Or maybe nothing at all . It was [my]0-i personal retaliation for having gone [my]0-i first twenty - five years without [[my]0-i own bedroom]1743-my own bedroom – without [my]0-i own voice or taste or tiny lick of independence . Thanks to that late start , [I]0-i loved the freedom of living alone like [a normal person]1744-a normal person loved [[their]1744-a normal person mother]1745-their mother or [spouse]1746-spouse . But tonight was one of those nights that made [me]0-i kind of itch for [a roommate]1747-a roommate . Mostly because [I]0-i did n’t want to be [the one to get up and investigate the bumping and thumping outside in the hall]1748-the one to get up and investigate the bumping and thumping outside in the hall . It was almost 10:30PM – all [I]0-i wanted at this hour was to play some Sia , pour some wine and risk the safety of [my]0-i iPad as [I]0-i read it in the bath . [I]0-i wanted to paint [my]0-i toes in [Essie]97-stella rhys contents ’s Chinchilly , sleep by midnight and wake up early to start the custom order of truffles that had to be shipped to [a Long Island wedding]1749-a long island wedding by Tuesday . So while it was selfish and vaguely bitchy , [I]0-i pretended not to hear [[my]0-i neighbor]1750-my neighbor struggling out in [the hall]432-the hall . More often than not , it was [her]1750-my neighbor finicky lock giving [her]1750-my neighbor trouble , and generally , [I]0-i was the one who came to the rescue . But not tonight . “ [You]1750-my neighbor ’ll figure it out , [Tess]202-tess , ”[0-i] [I]0-i whispered as [I]0-i finally let [myself]0-i close [my]0-i eyes and breathe in the lavender steam . [I]0-i sighed as [I]0-i leaned slowly back in the hot water , soaking in the Epsom salts and feeling them start to buzz against [my]0-i skin . But the second [my]0-i head touched [my]0-i bath pillow , a loud noise sounded outside . [My]0-i eyes flew back open as [I]0-i waited to hear it again . [I]0-i breathed out when several seconds of silence passed – even waited another few to be safe . Once [I]0-i ruled that [the coast]1302-the coast was clear , [I]0-i grabbed [my]0-i glass of wine and relaxed once more . But [my]0-i back had barely hit the tub before the sound came back louder . Thump ! “ [Tess]202-tess ! ”[0-i] [I]0-i groaned to [myself]0-i , sitting up and staring out [my]0-i bathroom door . [I]0-i waited to hear a strike three but instead of a thump this time , it was a splintering crash . “ Shit ! ”[0-i] Water sloshed onto the floor as [I]0-i immediately jumped up and grabbed [my]0-i robe , [my]0-i heart beating fast as [I]0-i imagined [Tess]202-tess bleeding on the floor in [the hall]432-the hall , surrounded by a million shards of glass all because [I]0-i would n’t get out of [my]0-i bath . Shit , shit , shit . [I]0-i cursed [myself]0-i as [my]0-i feet tracked water all throughout [the house]875-the house till [I]0-i breathlessly reached the door , [my]0-i fingers unlatching all three locks at lightning speed before gripping the knob and swinging it wide open . And once the door was open , [I]0-i stared . Then [I]0-i stared some more . Holy … what . It was n’t [Tess]202-tess . [I]0-i knew that because [my]0-i eyes hit chest first – wide , hard chest stretching the soft cotton of a heather grey V - neck . [I]0-i could practically hear [my]0-i jaw creaking open as [my]0-i gaze then traveled north to broad shoulders , sculpted collarbones , and a square jaw boasting the kind of dark , trimmed stubble that made [my]0-i fingers twitch with the need to touch . Shit . [I]0-i had to catch [my]0-i breath when [our]1755-our eyes finally locked , feeling legitimately smacked in the face with [this stranger]1756-this stranger ’s gorgeousness . [He]1756-this stranger was [an absolute wall of muscle and beauty with thick , dark hair and light green eyes]1757-an absolute wall of muscle and beauty with thick , dark hair and light green eyes and for a moment [I]0-i forgot where [I]0-i was , because in what world did [a man who looked like this]1758-a man who looked like this end up at [my]0-i door ? “ Hi , ”[1756-this stranger] [he]1756-this stranger said with a faint smile . “ [Lia]101-lia , right ? ”[1756-this stranger] [My]0-i head tilted . And in what world did [he]1756-this stranger somehow know [my]0-i name ? “ [I]1756-this stranger … ”[1756-this stranger] [I]0-i failed to sort through all the questions at the tip of [my]0-i tongue . “ Hi , ”[0-i] [I]0-i finally said , letting go of [my]0-i mission to magically figure out what was happening . Instead , [I]0-i waited for [him]1756-this stranger to introduce [himself]1756-this stranger and tell [me]0-i who [he]1756-this stranger was – whether [he]1756-this stranger had in fact been plucked from the cover of [Men]1828-men ’s Health or maybe some steamy billboard for [Calvin Klein]203-calvin klein . But instead [he]1756-this stranger stood there a moment , brows up as [his]1756-this stranger gaze dipped down to [my]0-i body – and only then did [I]0-i realize what [I]0-i barely had on . “ Shit , ”[0-i] [I]0-i hissed , grabbing [my]0-i robe and wondering how much of [me]0-i [he]1756-this stranger ’d seen before [I]0-i remembered to actually tie the thing shut . “ [I]263-the stranger should probably be looking away , right ? ”[263-the stranger] [the stranger]263-the stranger asked . With a laugh . [I]0-i shot daggers at [him]1756-this stranger as [I]0-i struggled to fix [my]0-i indecency . “ Yes ? ”[0-i] [I]0-i answered brusquely , [my]0-i cheeks burning as [I]0-i cinched the sash around [my]0-i waist . [I]0-i stared at [the stranger]263-the stranger as [he]263-the stranger faced away from [me]0-i now , chewing a wicked grin back as [he]263-the stranger palmed that ridiculously square jaw . “ What did [you]263-the stranger see ? ”[0-i] [I]0-i demanded hotly . “ Did [you]263-the stranger see anything ? ”[0-i] “ [I]263-the stranger saw a lot . [I]0-i meant nipple but [I]0-i was n’t about to say it . [He]263-the stranger laughed . “ If [you]0-i mean nipple , [my]263-the stranger answer is no . ”[263-the stranger] [My]0-i mouth fell open . “ Unless [you]263-the stranger count what [I]263-the stranger can see through that wet thing [you]263-the stranger ’re wearing . ”[263-the stranger] [I]0-i stared down at [myself]0-i and hastily fanned [my]0-i hair over [my]0-i breasts . [I]0-i wanted to call [him]263-the stranger out but [I]0-i could n’t find [my]0-i words so glaring back up , [I]0-i simply snapped , “ Who are [you]263-the stranger ? ”[0-i] “ [Lukas Hendricks]102-lukas . [I]0-i ’m [[Tess]202-tess ’s brother]2922-tess ’s brother . ”[0-i] [I]0-i gaped at [him]263-the stranger as [he]263-the stranger turned back to [me]0-i . “ Really ? ”[263-the stranger] It was hard to imagine . [He]263-the stranger looked about a foot taller and wider than [her]1762-her , and [I]0-i could already tell [he]263-the stranger shared none of [her]1762-her manners or humility . Fuming , [I]0-i craned [my]0-i neck to see past [his]263-the stranger broad frame , finally spotting the shattered remains of the floor vase that once sat at the end of [the hall]432-the hall between [our]1764-our doors . “ What just happened ? ”[263-the stranger] [He]263-the stranger peered over [his]263-the stranger shoulder , letting out a short breath of annoyance . “ Right . [I]263-the stranger was having some trouble with the key .
